newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria central bank allots 10.28 bln ATS in repos.
newsitem.headline: Austria central bank allots 10.28 bln ATS in repos.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank said on Friday it had allotted 10.28 billion schillings in two-week repos at a fixed rate of 3.0 percent, unchanged from last week.
The bank said it had filled 12 percent of bids.
Last week the central bank allotted 14.04 billion schillings in 10-day repos, filling 15 percent of bids.

The bank last week announced it would switch to offering two-week repos from its previous seven day agreements as from January 10 to conform with standard procedure in other European countries. -- Vienna newsroom +431 53112 274
